PageInfo.Message:
As your bond with a pawn grows, you may be asked
to do something special
Respond to the pawn's feelings to further
strengthen your bond!

By granting the request, you may receive a
special thank you.
<COL ffdc78>If you leave or enter your room
without accepting the request the pawn will
reconsider the request, so you need to be
careful</COL>
